column4: When using ffmpeg to convert video to audio, i recieve 'unknown encoder: libmp3lame' i have libmp3lame0, and libmp3lame-dev installed.  Could anyone help?
you know you can use mplayer to extract audio from video?
yes but im actually doing this all via command line in debian ';(
yes .. mplayer -ao pcm -vo null inputfile.avi  .. will generate audiodump.wav
